name: Fog And Sea (unseconds)
description:
You have died.. but it's ok

You're from a place where the dead move to places built on or around giant creatures. speed date these creatures to find out where you'll wind up in the afterlife!

Fog and Sea is a visual novel/dating sim based around getting closer to two giant entities that also serve as cities populated by the dead. Its a remake of an older game I made for a jam that a lot of people seemed to enjoy.

Nice things said about the older version

(compiled from comments + jam page comments)

"Really immersive and well polished visual novel. The art is also awesome. " "created an account just to comment here: this game is a work of art, loved every second of it. really hoping to see more of you, man!" "the art style is insanely eye catching and really sets it apart from other submissions. Your writing is quite good too and the dialogue feels well put together." "A genuinely beautiful and unique game. I loved every moment :3" "Short and sweet, but a really nice experience." Things to note

- This game is very short, ~30 minutes

- I made this game to post to a bundle so if you wait for a while you can probably get it along with a lot of other queer games for a similar price

- I've put download instructions for Mac users under downloads

- I intend to add a more visible transition between day and night, a Secret Ending and two more paintings

- as of right now there is a chance the text will scale poorly on higher resolution monitors, im working to fix this
